level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2(d) of the Drug House Abatement Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-446, December 5, 1996, 43 DCR 6664).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3631.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-176
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-176, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3631.

level.heading: Expiration of law Expiration of Law 8-139
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3631.
